site_name: FORMER WICKES AND HALFORDS, LAND OFF HAREFIELD ROAD
decision_conditions: Notwithstanding the non-material amendment hereby approved, all conditions relating to planning permission reference 16299/R/93/0504, dated 14.01.1994, must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
description:
Non-Material Amendment Application submitted under Section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended), to amend the description of development for planning consent reference 16299/R/93/0504 from 
'Redevelopment of site with two units for non-food retail purposes including service and access from Warwick Place and public access via Harefield Road'

to 

'Redevelopment of the site for purposes including service and access from Warwick Place and public accesses via Harefield Road.'
